original_text: Now this he said about the Spirit, whom those who believed in him were to receive, for as yet the Spirit had not been given, because Jesus was not yet glorified.
korean_text: 이는 그를 믿는 자들이 받을 성령을 가리켜 말씀하신 것이라 (예수께서 아직 영광을 받지 않으셨으므로 성령이 아직 그들에게 계시지 아니하시더라)

sentences.original_text: Now this he said about the Spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그가 성령에 대해 말한 것은

sentences.original_text: whom those who believed in him were to receive
for as yet the Spirit had not been given
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아직 성령이 주어지지 않았기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: because Jesus was not yet glorified
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 아직 영광을 받지 않으셨기 때문입니다
